name: Jewels Block Puzzle
description:
Jewels Block Puzzle is free classic game totally. You can enjoy it anytime, anywhere without network. This offline block puzzle has a very simple gameplay: just drag, drop, and fill up all the grid. But once playing, you will be addicted with this classic brick game.

The goal of this game is to drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on screen both vertically and horizontally. The more you cleared, the higher score you will get. Please remember if there is no room for the given blocks in the screen, then game over.

Jewels Block Puzzle is exciting free game that will catch your eyes with unbelievable ocean scene. You can see sparkling light in the ocean, the underwater sharks, various fishes and coral reefs as well.

Jewels Block Puzzle Features :
-A 1010 classic block puzzle game with simple gameplay and easy control
-unbelievable ocean scene
-Fun, colorful and engaging graphics
-Smooth and delicate animation
-Hours of fun, extremely exciting to play
-Support leader board

How to play :
- Drag and drop block into right place. There are many brick shapes to pick up.
-Try to fit them all in the row or column.
-The block will be clear and you get the point.
- Game will be over if there are no room for any the shapes below the grid
- Blocks can't be rotated
